mapper.select: select t.id,t.uid,t.code,s.name,t.cost,t.count from t_posi t,t_stock s where t.uid=#{uid} and t.code = s.code
select t.id,t.uid,t.code,s.name,t.direction,t.type,t.price,t.ocount,t.status,t.date,t.time from t_order t,t_stock s where t.uid=#{uid} and t.code = s.code
select t.id,t.uid,t.code,s.name,t.direction,t.type,t.price,t.ocount,t.status,t.date,t.time from t_trade t,t_stock s where t.uid=#{uid} and t.code = s.code
